Blog.post: Another sian day.. Haiz.. Today.... My dear dear still sick.. Haiz.. Don noe how to take care of her.. So lousy.. But I think today her health is better den yesterday.. Haha... Onli can tell her: Take care of urself..

Today bring my cousin go swimming... He is juz like me.. Like sports alot.. See him swim so happy, den suddenly something flash across my mind.. He got operation in August.. Den don noe after he recover, will he be able to do all kinds of sports which he likes or not.. Haiz.. But I promise to buy him a pair of Adidas Basketball Shoes after his operation.. Haiz.. Den now my dear dear also sick.. Cant even help her... Y??? Y my life like tat? Y muz my beloved and loved ppl be hurt no matter in physical or mentally?? Can I exchange my life for all of tat? Or muz I end my life, so tat all of their problems will be solved??

Haiz.. Today.. A horrible, terrible, stupid day for me.. Create so many trouble for myself.. Haiz... Y I so stupid? Make my dear dear unhappy... Den go home also kana scolded by parents.. Haiz... Y my life so lousy, terrible? Y? Can some1 juz tell me y?... I don noe wat i doing.. Not even myself noe.. Haiz.. Onli can tell my dear dear: Sorry abt today..

Today...Haiz... I don need to go Sec. 4 GCE 'N' level liao lah.. Don even noe a single thing abt POA.. Still need other people like my dear dear to teach me.. Haiz... Only can tell my dear dear thank u 4 teaching me.. But don teach me and den nv listen to lesson.. Thks... Love u...

Haiz... Yesterday & Today... No mood to do anything.. Whole face like no mood... Den my dear dear JY actually veri happy wan, den when see me lying on the table or see my no mood face, den whole person change also.. Change until no mood also... Juz hope to tell her: I'm SORRY!!

Haiz... Today sick like shit... Sianz... But lucky got Dr Koh to help me, if not ........ Today also not bad lah.. After recess, all the lessons all like free period like tat... All the teachers nv come... Den relieve teacher come in.. Haha.. Not bad sia... Haha.. :-)
Today veri bored siaz... Nothin to do.. Den stay back for ncc.. sianz sia.. But also veri happy lah.. My dear JY stay back behind to pei me also.. haha.. :-)
Yoz people... Thks 4 entering my webpage.. Hope u will like it and will come again.. Thks
